headline: Why Keysight Technologies (KEYS) Is Up 26.2% After Raising Q2 Outlook And Expanding AI And 6G Solutions
summary: In late February 2026, Keysight Technologies reported first-quarter 2026 sales of US$1,600 million and net income of US$281 million, and issued second-quarter revenue guidance of US$1.69 billion to US$1.71 billion while unveiling multiple AI, 6G, satellite, and high-speed test solutions with partners including Samsung, Ericsson, SoftBank, and Northeastern University. This combination of faster growth guidance and new solutions for AI data centers, NR-NTN satellite links, and agentic AI-RAN...
